channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 21:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Chervonogrihorivska territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 21:30 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Chervonogrihorivska territorial community. Take shelter! #Червоногригоривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
